lead_paragraph: The nation’s largest federal utility is preparing to sell the plant and 1,600 surrounding acres in northeastern Alabama at a fraction of its cost.

headline.print_headline: Partially Built Nuclear Plant Will Be Sold  at Steep Loss
headline.main: Unfinished Nuclear Plant, 4 Decades and $5 Billion Later, Will Be Sold

snippet: The nation’s largest federal utility is preparing to sell the plant and 1,600 surrounding acres in northeastern Alabama at a fraction of its cost....
